text: Iodine trifluoride is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is IF3. It has iodine and fluoride ions in it. The iodine is in its +3 oxidation state. ==Properties== Iodine trifluoride is a yellow solid. It breaks down above -28Â°C. It is made by reacting very cold fluorine with iodine. ==Related pages== *Iodine tricloride *Iodine pentafluoride *Iodine heptafluoride Category:Iodine compounds Category:Fluorine compounds
title: Iodine trifluoride
